main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Colorado Springs, Colorado on April 3, 1967, with the observer describing an object that appeared to have a halo of light and moved intermittently.
interesting points: The object was observed for a period of time and reported to have disappeared into the east,The object was compared to a star in brightness but was described to have strange movement patterns,There were reports suggesting the object might be Venus,The observer noted the object was about twice as long as it was wide,No photographs of the object were obtained as part of the report.
sighted object: unidentified object with a halo of light
witness description: A 29-year-old female who observed the object
